page.title: 18CHANGES IN THE HOUSE
page.content: In houses things are changing such as the oven.The oven is being replaced by the MICROWAVE OVEN.The Microwave is an electric box with lots of buttons.The Microwave cooks food much faster than the oven.It has a glass door and in_ side it has a special Microwave oven plate.You can even warm your cup of tea in the Microwave. TELEVISIONS are getting different channels.We have now got BBC1,BBC2,ITV and CHANNEL 4.The tv adverts are also changing.In the house another thing that is changing are the FRIDGES and FREEZERS.Fridges and freezers are gradually getting smaller and becoming fridge_freezers. COMPUTERS are also getting smaller they have came from filling up a whole room to a size where you can wear them on your wrist.
